1. Hydrogen
Element Symbol: H
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s¹
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [H]
Atom Arrangement: 1
2. Helium
Element Symbol: He
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s²
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [He]
Atom Arrangement: 2
3. Lithium
Element Symbol: Li
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s¹
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [He] 2s¹
Atom Arrangement: 2,1
4. Beryllium
Element Symbol: Be
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s²
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [He] 2s²
Atom Arrangement: 2,2
5. Boron
Element Symbol: B
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s² 2p¹
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [He] 2s² 2p¹
Atom Arrangement: 2,3
6. Carbon
Element Symbol: C
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s² 2p²
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [He] 2s² 2p²
Atom Arrangement: 2,4
7. Nitrogen
Element Symbol: N
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s² 2p³
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [He] 2s² 2p³
Atom Arrangement: 2,5
8. Oxygen
Element Symbol: O
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s² 2p⁴
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [He] 2s² 2p⁴
Atom Arrangement: 2,6
9. Fluorine
Element Symbol: F
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s² 2p⁵
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [He] 2s² 2p⁵
Atom Arrangement: 2,7
10. Neon
Element Symbol: Ne
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s² 2p⁶
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [He] 2s² 2p⁶
Atom Arrangement: 2,8
11. Sodium
Element Symbol: Na
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s² 2p⁶ 3s¹
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [Ne] 3s¹
Atom Arrangement: 2,8,1
12. Magnesium
Element Symbol: Mg
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s² 2p⁶ 3s²
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [Ne] 3s²
Atom Arrangement: 2,8,2

Element Symbol: Al
Electron Orbital Arrangement: 1s² 2s² 2p⁶ 3s² 3p¹
Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [Ne] 3s² 3p¹
Atom Arrangement: 2,8,3

Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [Ne] 3s² 3p⁶
Atom Arrangement: 2,8,8

Shorthand Electron Arrangement: [Ar] 4s¹
Atom Arrangement: 2,8,8,1

Atom Arrangement: 2,8,8,2

Element Symbol: Sc

Atom Arrangement: 2,8,9,2
22. Titanium
